fields.title: Balkan Mayhem
fields.description: Dive into a Balkan conquest game with troop production, vassal resource income, land grabbing, shipbuilding, clashing swords and annoying your friends with last moment decisions!

fields.title: Startup Hell
fields.description: Enter the boots of an HR and assemble the perfect team to create better apps then your opponent! Be careful though, as for a perfect match, you will need both front-end and back-end developers with specific programming language knowledge and unique experience. And, of course, the (potentially) most powerful of them all - interns!
